DOC.criteria: Healthy male Nonsmokers Aged 3570 year Fasting TAG concentration ≥1.2 mmol/L . Reported history CVD ( myocardial infarction , angina , venous thrombosis , stroke ) , impaired fasting glucose/uncontrolled type 2 diabetes ( fast glucose ≥ 6.1 mmol/L ) , cancer , kidney , liver bowel disease . Presence gastrointestinal disorder use drug , likely alter gastrointestinal motility nutrient absorption .
